Actions.Name: Dancing Light
Actions.Description: The [name] summons a dancing light in range in any space not adjacent to a character.

Summons.Name: Dancing Light
Summons.SummonEffects: When a foe starts or ends a turn adjacent to the light, it explodes in a medium blast area effect centered on it. Characters inside must save or take [fray] damage twice, or once on a successful save. If the light is destroyed, it fizzles out without exploding.
